com.eatthepath.pushy.apns.server.MockApnsServerBuilder

Packages that use MockApnsServerBuilder
Package Description
com.eatthepath.pushy.apns.server
Contains classes and interfaces for working with mock APNs servers.

  • Uses of MockApnsServerBuilder in com.eatthepath.pushy.apns.server

    MockApnsServerBuilder MockApnsServerBuilder.setHandlerFactory​(PushNotificationHandlerFactory handlerFactory)
    Sets the handler factory to be used to construct push notification handlers for the server under construction.
    MockApnsServerBuilder MockApnsServerBuilder.setListener​(MockApnsServerListener listener)
    Sets the listener to be notified when notifications are accepted or rejected by the server under construction.
